Your Agent Component
Digital Experience Site Component Customization

Show your Policyholder site users interesting and relevant articles to help keep them up-to-date on the latest news about your company with the Insurance Articles Component.

The component is composed of a FlexCard and the LWC compiled from the FlexCard. It's designed for desktop and mobile, styled with the Newport Design System.

The parts of this component are:
Text label
Text: Articles
Articles Child component

The FlexCard contains elements, including Text element that displays the label, Child FlexCard, and Custom CSS styles. You can add, remove, or change these elements based on your needs.

To customize this component, see Digital Experience Site Component Customization Overview.

Insurance Articles Child Component
Show your Policyholder site users articles that they might find helpful and interesting with the Insurance Articles Child component.
It's a child component that sits inside of the Insurance Articles container component.
title: Customizing Policyholder Experiences
